# ThirdwebSDK.resolveContractType() method

**Signature:**

```typescript
resolveContractType(contractAddress: AddressOrEns): Promise<ContractType>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter       | Type                                  | Description                                                             |
| --------------- | ------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| contractAddress | [AddressOrEns](./sdk.addressorens.md) | the address of the contract to attempt to resolve the contract type for |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[ContractType](./sdk.contracttype.md)&gt;

the [ContractType](./sdk.contracttype.md) for the given contract address
